actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to remove the exemption of ordinary livestock from the Interstate Commerce Act.

summary.text: Removes the exemption for motor vehicles carrying ordinary livestock from the provisions of the Interstate Commerce Act relating to qualifications and maximum hours of service of employees and safety of operation or standards of equipment. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 303(b)(6))

titles.title: A bill to remove the exemption of ordinary livestock from the Interstate Commerce Act.
